game.name: Menes: The Chainbreaker
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Glide using the Icarus wings, face deadly bosses and uncover why is the Creator being chained. You will fall a lot, but rise even more!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Glide using the Icarus wings, face deadly bosses and uncover why is the Creator being chained. You will fall a lot, but rise even more!
